description.narrative: The objective is to improve the reliability and quality of electricity supply to consumers in the Almaty region in an environmentally responsible and financially sustainable manner.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, para 5 | Description :The Borrower shall attain Self-financing Ratio equal to 10% of thethree-year moving average investment program in calendar year 2011,and 20%after Dec.31, 2011, until completion of the project. |Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, para 5 | Description :The Borrower shall meet the foll:Current Ratio 0.8 for calendaryear 2011 and 1.0 after Dec.31,2011. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, para 5 | Description :The Borrower shall refrain from incurring additional debt unlessthe Debt Service Ratio is at least 0.9 for calendar year 2011 and 1.2 after December31, 2011, until completion of the Project. |Frequency :Yearly
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IA, para 2 | Description :The Borrower shall maintain the PMD at all times during theimplementation of the Project. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IA, para 3a | Description :The Borrower shall prepare a Land Acquisition Plan, prior to thecommencement of any construction works requiring land acquisition. | Due Date :29-Mar-2013

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IA, para 4a and 4b | Description :The Borrower shall prepare a detailed EA ,an updated EMP,as necessary, prior to the construction of overhead transmission lines and carry out the Project in accordance with these. | DueDate :29-Mar-2013

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IIA | Description :The Borrower shall prepare Project Reports covering ther period of onecalendar quarter and submit to the Bank no later than (45) days after the end of that period. | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IIB2 | Description :The Borrower shall prepare and furnish to the Bank no later than 45 daysafter the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Project covering the quarter. | Frequency:Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section IIB3 | Description :The Borrower shall have its financial statements and the FinancialStatements for the Project audited each fiscal year and submit to the Bank no later than 6 months after the end of such period. |Frequency :Yearly
